sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>FS Map Preferences mapping</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[processAllRecords();

function processAllRecords() {
	var count = 0, insertCount = 0;
	var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user_has_role');
	gr.addQuery("role.name", "wm_agent");
	var nextChunkOfCIs = chunker(gr, 100);
	while (nextChunkOfCIs()) {
		while (gr.next()) {
			//gs.log('gr.user ' + gr.user.name + ' Count ' + count++, 'FSFilterMapping');
			var pref = new GlideRecord("sys_user_preference");
			pref.addQuery("user", gr.user);
			pref.addQuery("name", "geo_location_user_property");
			pref.query();
			while (pref.next()) {
				var prefString = pref.value;
				//gs.print(prefString);
				prefString = prefString.replace(/\|/g, "#");
				var prefArray = prefString.split("#");
				var keyValuePair = [];
				var mapTypeSet = false;
				var filter = {};
				for (var i = 0; i < prefArray.length; i++) {
					keyValuePair = prefArray[i].split("=");
					var key = keyValuePair[0] ,value = keyValuePair[1];
					//gs.log('User Key/ Value' + keyValuePair[0] + ' / '  + keyValuePair[1], 'FSFilterMapping');
					
					if ("unassigned" == key) {
						if (value && value.trim() !='')
							filter['unassigned'] = value;
					}
					if ("assigned" == key) {
						if (value && value.trim() !='')
							filter['assigned'] = value;
					}
					if ("myLocation" == key) {
						if (value && value.trim() !='')
							filter['myLocation'] = value;
					}
					if ("routingNumbers" == key) {
						if (value && value.trim() !='')
							filter['routingNumbers'] = value;
					}

					if ("mapType" == key) {
						if (value && value.trim() !='')
							filter['mapType'] = value;
					}

					if ("agent" == key) {
						if (value && value.trim() !='')
							filter['agent'] = value;
					}

					if ("date" == key) {
						if (value && value.trim() !='')
							filter['on'] = value;
					}
				}
				
				if (filter.mapType == 'agent') {
					var configGr = new GlideRecord("wm_map_filters_config");
					configGr.initialize();
					configGr.show_unassigned_tasks = filter.unassigned;
					configGr.show_assigned_tasks = filter.assigned;
					configGr.show_my_location = filter.myLocation;
					configGr.show_routing_numbers = filter.routingNumbers;
					configGr.on = filter.on;
					configGr.user = filter.agent;
					configGr.setWorkflow(false);
					//gs.log('*****Inserted config for User ' + configGr.user + ' insertCount ' + (++insertCount), 'FSFilterMapping');
					configGr.insert();
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
	
	
function chunker(gr, size) {
	var window_start = 0;
	var window_size = size;
	var chunky_gr = gr;
	return nextChunk;

	function nextChunk() {
		gr.chooseWindow(window_start, window_start + window_size);
		gr.query();
		var has_next = (window_start < gr.getRowCount());
		window_start += window_size;
		return has_next;
	}
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2016-07-12 00:30:29</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>dfe6e5717f202200068712f44efa9135</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>FS Map Preferences mapping</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">25371ef01b8a21109c18a9f9bc4bcb1e</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_dfe6e5717f202200068712f44efa9135</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2016-07-19 21:51:21</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
